dc_title_s: America; Gedrukt by Ioachim Bormeester const en caart verkooper inde Warmoes Straat tot Amsterdam met previlegie.
dc_description_s: Relief shown pictorially. Inset of Arctic region in upper left corner. Decorative cartouche depicting indigenous people, animals and landscapes. Animals depicted on continents. Shows California as an island. Shows Iberian peninsula and and northern Africa. 1 map; 56 x 93 cm. This map is in the public domain. Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library.
